Subject: Re: Energon hunt
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

"First of all I do have a small number of troops, who are working on their
ship. And I am Megatron, and fully powered, I take what I want, to satisfy
my hunger, my hunger for power. We can start small, and work our way up.
Find any who would be willing to follow us, and pursuade them". His energon
was drastic now, he was hoping this would end soon.
